Who runs Pickle Finance?

Pickle Finance is an anonymous organization, guided through community governance.

Some text here.

Now for the question on everyone’s mind, should I get some PICKLE? →

  1. 1
    What is Pickle Finance?
    Pickle is a platform that incentivizes the maintenance of crypto asset pegs through yield-generating products.
  2. 2
    What are Pickle Jars?
    Pickle Jars are products that generate yield for users, while working to keep assets on peg.
  3. 3
    What are Pickle Farms?
    Pickle Farms are products that allow users to earn the PICKLE token, while helping crypto assets remain on peg.
  4. 4
    Should I own some Pickle?
    That’s up to you, but here’s some resources to help make the decision and pick up some PICKLE if you choose!
  5. 5
    Who runs Pickle Finance?
    Pickle Finance is an anonymous organization, guided through community governance.
  6. 6
    Frequently Asked Questions
    Now that you know the basics, let’s answer some of the most frequently asked questions.
